metadata.title: CVE-2023-45872 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 6.2.11 and 6.3.x through 6.6.x before6.6.1. When a QML image refers to an image whose content is not known yet,there is an assumption that it is an SVG document, leading to a denial ofservice (application crash) if it is not actually an SVG document.

criterions.comment: qt6-svg package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
